title: Enhancing Programming Practical Skills: Workshop on Language Use Strategy Design for EFL Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: They can classify and explain at least three English usage strategies based on learner proficiency levels.
They can derive effective strategies by comparing language usage cases observed in actual classroom settings.
They can complete a PBL project that revises language strategies based on formative assessment results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
